author: chfast
content: You mean montgomery multiplication in Fp (with precomputed modulus inversion)? <@427903869226582018> may some some numbers from the EVMMAX work.

author: chfast
content: The intention is that there should not be any additional bytes above what the header describes. So if the number are correct this should be EOF validation failure. Test are generated using the geth implementation (likely a bug there).

author: chfast
